lead_paragraph: Amra-Faye Wright, who plays Velma Kelly in “Chicago,” will be the first actress to do the part in English on Broadway and then in Japanese overseas.
snippet: Amra-Faye Wright, who plays Velma Kelly in “Chicago,” will be the first actress to do the part in English on Broadway and then in Japanese overseas.

headline.main: For Her Next Act, Velma Is Japanese
headline.seo: Amra-Faye Wright to Play Velma Kelly in Japanese
headline.print_headline: For Her Next Act, Velma Is Japanese
